short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for storing links, images, and files locally.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extension for effortless local storage of links, images, and files. Perfect for students and professionals, this user-friendly tool allows you to save and categorize your favorite online content directly on your device.

No need to go back and forth between folders and notes.
